::: Ominous Prime sat at his communications consol. He sent a message to Hell 
Beast and got a quick response. :::

::: Ominous smiled ::: Hello Commander.

::: Hell Beast snarled ::: I have no time for you, Ominous Prime. I have 
troops to reapir, and to deal with the Maximals....

::: Ominous ::: How bout you forget about them, and we leave this planet, for 
good.

::: Hell Beast ::: Im listening....

::: Ominous ::: Im repairing a Decepticon shuttle, and if you were to send 
over two techs that could help me we could be ready to leave in several hours.

::: Hell Beast ::: Ill send Gremlin and Marine right over. The sooner the 
better.

:::: Ominous ::: And, also....a fallen commrad wants to talk to you.

::: Marine steps forward, ::: Commander Hell Beast, it is an honor to serve 
under you agian.

::: Hell Beast smiles ::: Marine, help out. And how are we going to move the 
energon?

::: Ominous ::: Tractor beams. It will be a simple transfer.

:::: Hell Beast switches off the Comm, steps on a little spider that had 
crawled off Mosquitor, and sent Transanulas and Gremlin to help 
Ominous. :::
